metaTitle: Commercial Fleet Management & Video Telematics Solutions
metaDesc: FleetGoo provides advanced 4G Dashcams, MDVR systems, and GPS tracking for commercial fleets. Enhance safety and efficiency with our AI-powered IoT solutions.
keywords: fleet management, dashcam, MDVR, GPS tracking, video telematics, commercial vehicle safety

hero.title: Commercial Fleet Hardware: Dashcam, GPS & MDVR Systems
hero.subtitle: Transform Your Fleet Operations with Advanced AI-Powered Intelligence.
hero.description: Empower your commercial fleet with our intelligent 4G Dashcams, precise GPS tracking, and robust MDVR systems. Achieve superior safety, efficiency, and real-time visibility through smart hardware, integrated into a powerful management platform.

valueProps.title: Solving Your Toughest Fleet Challenges
valueProps.subtitle: We turn operational data into actionable intelligence.

items.title: Eliminate Safety Blind Spots
items.pain: Rising accident rates and unclear liability.
items.solution: Our ADAS & DMS dashcams detect fatigue and dangers in real-time, preventing accidents before they happen.

items.title: Reduce Operational Costs
items.pain: High fuel consumption and unauthorized usage.
items.solution: Optimize routes and monitor idling with precision tracking to cut fuel costs by up to 20%.

items.title: Maximise Asset Utilization
items.solution: Gain total visibility over every vehicle and heavy machine to ensure they are always working for you.

featuredProducts.title: Featured Hardware
featuredProducts.subtitle: Explore our flagship devices designed for reliability and performance.

tabs.label: D501 - AI Dashcam
tabs.title: D501 Smart 4G Dashcam
tabs.description: Designed for commercial vehicles, including those compliant with Chinese Ministry of Transport standards (such as for ride-hailing and logistics), this AI dash cam integrates dual 1080P video, cloud storage, BeiDou positioning, Driver Monitoring System (DMS), and Advanced Driver Assistance System (ADAS) to enhance safety and fleet management efficiency.

tabs.label: D901 - 4CH MDVR
tabs.title: D901 4-Channel MDVR
tabs.description: Compact all-in-one device with central control screen for freight and logistics monitoring. Supports 4-channel AHD video input, AI blind spot warnings, sentry mode, fuel theft prevention alerts, AI voice recognition, and 4G remote monitoring.
benefits: AI Detection fuel theft prevention, and voice recognition

items.title: Advanced Engineering
items.description: Proprietary video compression technology reducing data usage by 40%.

items.title: Global Connectivity
items.description: Multi-network IoT SIMs ensuring seamless coverage across borders.

items.title: Enterprise Security
items.description: End-to-end encryption and GDPR compliant cloud infrastructure.

items.title: 99.9% Uptime
items.description: Redundant server architecture ensuring your data is always accessible.

leadMagnet.title: Get a Custom Quote for Your Fleet
leadMagnet.subtitle: Fill out the form below and one of our fleet experts will reach out with a tailored solution.

form.privacyNote: We respect your privacy. Your data is secure and will never be shared with third parties.
